caption.center: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Willie BARNETT, Sr., Petitioner.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 0083 W.D.Misc. Docket 1993 from the order of the Superior Court entered October 14, 1993 at 1462 Pittsburgh 1992, 638 A.2d 264, affirming Court of Common Pleas of Erie County, Criminal Division, at No. 1749 of 1991.
opinion.panel: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
AND NOW, this 28th day of January, 1994, the request to proceed in forma pauperis is granted and the Motion to Extend Time to Perfect Nunc Pro Tunc Appeal is denied.
Mr. Justice Montemuro is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1800, due to the unavailability of Mr. Justice Larsen, see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.Page 270
